query: SELECT DATE(dataVenda) as data, COUNT(*) as qtd, SUM(valorTotal)/100 as total FROM vendas WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025 AND MONTH(dataVenda) = 12 GROUP BY DATE(dataVenda) ORDER BY data DESC
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT DATE(dataVenda) as data, COUNT(*) as qtd, SUM(valorTotal)/100 as total FROM vendas WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025 AND MONTH(dataVenda) = 12 GROUP BY DATE(dataVenda) ORDER BY data DESC
